items.sentence: Do you want me to fix your broken shovel or don\'t you?

Tom doesn\'t want anyone to know he\'s going to Boston.
Tom can either be your best friend or your worst enemy.
Tom can expect to hear from us by the end of the month.
Tom pretended not to know how to get to Mary\'s school.
Tom scolded Mary for not calling to say she\'d be late.
It takes 165 years for Neptune to orbit around the sun.
Mary shaves her legs more often than Alice shaves hers.
Mary can\'t come. She has to take care of her daughter.
Mary doesn\'t play with the doll her father bought her.
Mary is one of the most beautiful women I\'ve ever met.

What Tom doesn\'t know about cars isn\'t worth knowing.
I thought you said you weren\'t going to smoke anymore.
I wonder if she\'ll recognize me after all these years.
The doctor told us that what Tom has isn\'t contagious.

Have you ever thought about getting a pilot\'s license?
Tom was very upset when Mary didn\'t come to his party.
If you don\'t want to say anything, you don\'t have to.

Tom told everybody at work that he was going to retire.

If I lost my key, I wouldn\'t be able to lock the door.
